enableFeatures(uint256,bool).details: allows a contract to enable/disable certain feature(s)

params._enable: true to enable the feature(s), false to disabled them

isSupported(address,uint256).details: returns true if a given contract supports the given feature(s), false if not

params._contract: contract address to check support for

isSupported(address,uint256).return: true if the contract supports the feature(s), false if not
